Package org.apache.avalon.cornerstone.services.connection

Defintion of the connection service.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConnectionHandler This interface is the way in which incoming connections are processed.
ConnectionHandlerFactory This interface is the way in which handlers are created.
ConnectionManager This is the service through which ConnectionManagement occurs.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHandlerFactory Helper class to extend to create handler factorys.
AbstractService Helper class to create protocol services.
DefaultHandlerFactory Default Hnalder factory that creates instances via reflection.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.cornerstone.services.connection Description

Defintion of the connection service.
